6// DisplayMtl.h:
7// Defines the class interface for DisplayMtl, implementing DisplayImpl.
8//
9
10#ifndef LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_DISPLAYMTL_H_
11#define LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_DISPLAYMTL_H_
12
13#include "common/PackedEnums.h"
14#include "libANGLE/angletypes.h"
15#include "libANGLE/renderer/DisplayImpl.h"
16#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_command_buffer.h"
17#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_format_utils.h"
18#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_render_utils.h"
19#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_state_cache.h"
20#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_utils.h"
21#include "platform/FeaturesMtl.h"
22
23namespace egl
24{
25class Surface;
26}
27
28namespace rx
29{
30class ShareGroupMtl : public ShareGroupImpl
31{};
32
33class ContextMtl;
34
35struct DefaultShaderAsyncInfoMtl;
36
37class DisplayMtl : public DisplayImpl
38{
39 public:
40 DisplayMtl(const egl::DisplayState &state);
41 ~DisplayMtl() override;
42
43 egl::Error initialize(egl::Display *display) override;
44 void terminate() override;
45
46 bool testDeviceLost() override;
47 egl::Error restoreLostDevice(const egl::Display *display) override;
48
49 std::string getVendorString() const override;
50
51 DeviceImpl *createDevice() override;
52
53 egl::Error waitClient(const gl::Context *context) override;
54 egl::Error waitNative(const gl::Context *context, EGLint engine) override;
55 egl::Error validateClientBuffer(const egl::Config *configuration,
56 EGLenum buftype,
57 EGLClientBuffer clientBuffer,
58 const egl::AttributeMap &attribs) const override;
59
60 SurfaceImpl *createWindowSurface(const egl::SurfaceState &state,
61 EGLNativeWindowType window,
62 const egl::AttributeMap &attribs) override;
63 SurfaceImpl *createPbufferSurface(const egl::SurfaceState &state,
64 const egl::AttributeMap &attribs) override;
65 SurfaceImpl *createPbufferFromClientBuffer(const egl::SurfaceState &state,
66 EGLenum buftype,
67 EGLClientBuffer clientBuffer,
68 const egl::AttributeMap &attribs) override;
69 SurfaceImpl *createPixmapSurface(const egl::SurfaceState &state,
70 NativePixmapType nativePixmap,
71 const egl::AttributeMap &attribs) override;
72
73 ImageImpl *createImage(const egl::ImageState &state,
74 const gl::Context *context,
75 EGLenum target,
76 const egl::AttributeMap &attribs) override;
77
78 ContextImpl *createContext(const gl::State &state,
79 gl::ErrorSet *errorSet,
80 const egl::Config *configuration,
81 const gl::Context *shareContext,
82 const egl::AttributeMap &attribs) override;
83
84 StreamProducerImpl *createStreamProducerD3DTexture(egl::Stream::ConsumerType consumerType,
85 const egl::AttributeMap &attribs) override;
86
87 ShareGroupImpl *createShareGroup() override;
88
89 ExternalImageSiblingImpl *createExternalImageSibling(const gl::Context *context,
90 EGLenum target,
91 EGLClientBuffer buffer,
92 const egl::AttributeMap &attribs) override;
93 gl::Version getMaxSupportedESVersion() const override;
94 gl::Version getMaxConformantESVersion() const override;
95
96 EGLSyncImpl *createSync(const egl::AttributeMap &attribs) override;
97
98 egl::Error makeCurrent(egl::Display *display,
99 egl::Surface *drawSurface,
100 egl::Surface *readSurface,
101 gl::Context *context) override;
102
103 void populateFeatureList(angle::FeatureList *features) override;
104
105 bool isValidNativeWindow(EGLNativeWindowType window) const override;
106
107 egl::Error validateImageClientBuffer(const gl::Context *context,
108 EGLenum target,
109 EGLClientBuffer clientBuffer,
110 const egl::AttributeMap &attribs) const override;
111
112 egl::ConfigSet generateConfigs() override;
113
114 std::string getRendererDescription() const;
115 gl::Caps getNativeCaps() const;
116 const gl::TextureCapsMap &getNativeTextureCaps() const;
117 const gl::Extensions &getNativeExtensions() const;
118 const gl::Limitations &getNativeLimitations() const;
119 const angle::FeaturesMtl &getFeatures() const { return mFeatures; }
120
121 // Check whether either of the specified iOS or Mac GPU family is supported
122 bool supportsEitherGPUFamily(uint8_t iOSFamily, uint8_t macFamily) const;
123 bool supportsIOSGPUFamily(uint8_t iOSFamily) const;
124 bool supportsMacGPUFamily(uint8_t macFamily) const;
125 bool isAMD() const;
126 bool isIntel() const;
127 bool isNVIDIA() const;
128
129 id<MTLDevice> getMetalDevice() const { return mMetalDevice; }
130
131 mtl::CommandQueue &cmdQueue() { return mCmdQueue; }
132 const mtl::FormatTable &getFormatTable() const { return mFormatTable; }
133 mtl::RenderUtils &getUtils() { return mUtils; }
134 mtl::StateCache &getStateCache() { return mStateCache; }
135
136 id<MTLLibrary> getDefaultShadersLib();
137
138 id<MTLDepthStencilState> getDepthStencilState(const mtl::DepthStencilDesc &desc)
139 {
140 return mStateCache.getDepthStencilState(getMetalDevice(), desc);
141 }
142 id<MTLSamplerState> getSamplerState(const mtl::SamplerDesc &desc)
143 {
144 return mStateCache.getSamplerState(getMetalDevice(), desc);
145 }
146
147 const mtl::Format &getPixelFormat(angle::FormatID angleFormatId) const
148 {
149 return mFormatTable.getPixelFormat(angleFormatId);
150 }
151 const mtl::FormatCaps &getNativeFormatCaps(MTLPixelFormat mtlFormat) const
152 {
153 return mFormatTable.getNativeFormatCaps(mtlFormat);
154 }
155
156 // See mtl::FormatTable::getVertexFormat()
157 const mtl::VertexFormat &getVertexFormat(angle::FormatID angleFormatId,
158 bool tightlyPacked) const
159 {
160 return mFormatTable.getVertexFormat(angleFormatId, tightlyPacked);
161 }
162#if ANGLE_MTL_EVENT_AVAILABLE
163 mtl::AutoObjCObj<MTLSharedEventListener> getOrCreateSharedEventListener();
164#endif
165 protected:
166 void generateExtensions(egl::DisplayExtensions *outExtensions) const override;
167 void generateCaps(egl::Caps *outCaps) const override;
168
169 private:
170 angle::Result initializeImpl(egl::Display *display);
171 void ensureCapsInitialized() const;
172 void initializeCaps() const;
173 void initializeExtensions() const;
174 void initializeTextureCaps() const;
175 void initializeFeatures();
176 void initializeLimitations();
177 EGLenum EGLDrawingBufferTextureTarget();
178 id<MTLDevice> getMetalDeviceMatchingAttribute(const egl::AttributeMap &attribs);
179 angle::Result initializeShaderLibrary();
180
181 mtl::AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLDevice>> mMetalDevice = nil;
182 uint32_t mMetalDeviceVendorId = 0;
183
184 mtl::CommandQueue mCmdQueue;
185
186 mutable mtl::FormatTable mFormatTable;
187 mtl::StateCache mStateCache;
188 mtl::RenderUtils mUtils;
189
190 // Built-in Shaders
191 std::shared_ptr<DefaultShaderAsyncInfoMtl> mDefaultShadersAsyncInfo;
192#if ANGLE_MTL_EVENT_AVAILABLE
193 mtl::AutoObjCObj<MTLSharedEventListener> mSharedEventListener;
194#endif
195
196 mutable bool mCapsInitialized;
197 mutable gl::TextureCapsMap mNativeTextureCaps;
198 mutable gl::Extensions mNativeExtensions;
199 mutable gl::Caps mNativeCaps;
200 mutable gl::Limitations mNativeLimitations;
201
202 angle::FeaturesMtl mFeatures;
203
204 // track whether we initialized (or released) glslang
205 bool mGlslangInitialized;
206};
207
208} // namespace rx
209
210#endif /* LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_DISPLAYMTL_H_ */
211
